comments.text:
Both the HD and SD versions of Angry Birds are playable in recent nightlies, but various sprites don't show up when I try to play them.  For example, when I reach the screen with the monster "PLAY" button and the side-scrolling landscape underneath it, I can't see the little gear icon in the bottom left of the game window.  If I click in that area, the "i" icon animates upward, and clicking again makes it animate downward.  I can click on the (invisible) Mute icon when the gear's expanded -- it just doesn't show.

System details follow, since this could be some sort of Linux graphics-card fail or something (but I thought the SD version was purely canvas2d and didn't invoke the graphics card at all?):
